Product_name: APPLE Watch Series7 (GPS+Cellular-41mm) Graphite Stainless Steel Case-Graphite Loop
Description: The largest, most advanced Always-on Retina display yet makes everything you do with your Apple Watch Series 7 bigger and better. Series 7 is the most durable Apple Watch ever built, with an even more crack-resistant front crystal. Advanced features let you measure your blood oxygen level, take an ECG anytime, and access mindfulness and sleep tracking apps. You can also track dozens of workouts, including new tai chi and pilates.

You can also track dozens of workouts, including new tai chi and pilates.

The Apple Watch is a smartwatch that not only sports a stylish design, but also has impressive features. This splash-resistant watch features a tough Ion-X glass display, a heart rate sensor, an accelerometer, a gyroscope and an ambient light sensor, making it perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. The S1P dual-core processor of this smartwatch, along with its watchOS 3 operating system, offers you a fast performance.

With built-in GPS, GLONASS, direct fire speaker and microphone, the Apple Watch can easily accompany you on all your adventures. This water-resistant smartwatch is powered by an S2 dual-core processor, making it fast and smooth. It also supports Bluetooth 4.0 and Wi-Fi for wireless connectivity, and has a heart rate sensor, an accelerometer, an ambient light sensor and a gyroscope.

Featuring a sleek Space Gray aluminium case and an S2 dual-core processor, the Apple Watch Nike+ strikes the perfect balance between style and efficiency. This water-resistant watch comes with a heart rate sensor, accelerometer, ambient light sensor and a gyroscope. Its direct fire speaker and microphone allows you to make calls from it. It also features inbuilt GPS and GLONASS systems.

It is both sturdy and attractive, and its S2 dual-core processor makes it fast too. This Bluetooth-enabled smartwatch comes with GPS and GLONASS built into it. It also allows you to make calls, all thanks to its direct fire speaker and microphone.

Description: The largest, most advanced Always-on Retina display yet makes everything you do with your Apple Watch Series 7 bigger and better. Series 7 is the most durable Apple Watch ever built, with an even more crack-resistant front crystal. Advanced features let you measure your blood oxygen level, take an ECG anytime, and access mindfulness and sleep tracking apps. You can also track dozens of workouts, including new tai chi and pilates.

Product_name: Noise Fit Buzz with 1.32inch HD Round Screen, Bluetooth calling and SPO2 Smartwatch
Description: Make style statements and redefine fashion with the impressive NoiseFit Buzz smartwatch that is bombarded with amazing features. This watch incorporates Bluetooth calling that allows you to make calls and answer calls in a jiffy. Moreover, it sports a 3.35 cm screen that enables you to see everything clearly without any hassles. Also, this watch boasts 9 different sports modes and a heart rate tracker which empowers you to take a leap towards your fitness goals.

Product_name: Noise ColorFit Qube Spo2, 1.4" Full Touch display, Multi-Sports modes, 7-day Battery Smartwatch
Description: It’s time to switch to smart life. Get your hands on the brand-new Noise ColorFit Qube Oxy smartwatch. With 1.4’’ coloured touchscreen display, a plethora of SpO2, cloud-based watch faces, 24/7 heart rate monitor, sleep monitor, 7 sports modes, dedicated NoiseFit Track app and a 7-day battery life, it has everything you have been looking for in your next smart partner. Plus, the IP68 rating ensures the smartwatch is as ready as you are.

Noise brings to you the new ColorFit Pro, the all-new colorful metallic premium finish LCD anti-scratch display, equipped with fitness tracker and other features to help your start your fitness journey. ColorFit Pro comes with magnetic charging. Simply plug in the charging clip to the back of the fitness band to charge and plug the charging cable into the adapter or USB port on your computer.

Product_name: boAt Wave Connect with Bluetooth Calling, Voice Assistant and 1.69" HD Display Smartwatch
Description: The boAt Wave Connect is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation with a 4.29 cm (1.69’’) LCD display and 60+ sports modes. The heart rate & Sp02 monitoring features on the watch keep you up to date with your vitals at all times. The ambient sound detection feature will notify you about noise levels around you so you can find the silence within and without. With IP68 Dust, Sweat & Splash Resistance and an impressive 7 day battery life your smartwatch will be your smart fitness companion through thick and thin!

Product_name: boAt Wave beat 1.69Inch HD display with complete health monitoring Smartwatch
Description: The boAt Wave Beat is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation and is here to make life easy. Your Wave Beat will remove all obstructions that may come on your goal achieving path. A large 1.69 Inches Square HD display makes everything come to life. The heart rate, blood oxygen monitoring, sleep tracking, sedentary alerts and notifications will keep you connected to the world within and outside at all times. With upto 7 days battery life and multiple sports modes, the watch keeps you moving, no matter what! The Crest App Health Ecosystem makes it easier to care for your loved ones health with Fitness Buddies, Wellness Crew and more! Weather Updates and IP68 Dust, Sweat & Splash Resistance will keep you on the go in all weathers.

Product_name: boAt Wave Ultima with 1.8 inch Curve Arc HD Display, Bluetooth Calling with BT v5.3 Smartwatch
Description: The boAt Wave Ultima is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation and is here to make life easy. Your Wave Ultima will remove all obstructions that may come on your goal achieving path. A large 1.8 Curve Arc display makes everything come to life. The single chip BT Calling feature will keep you connected to your near and dear ones on the go. The heart rate, blood oxygen monitoring, stress monitoring, sedentary alerts and notifications will keep you connected to the world within and outside at all times. With upto 10 days battery life(3 days on BT Calling) and 100+ sports modes with the IP68 dust, sweat & splash resistance, the watch keeps you moving, no matter what! On top of that, the heart rate, stress & SpO2 monitor keeps a check on your vitals while you work on yourself.

Product_name: boAt Storm Pro Call Bluetooth Calling 1.78" AMOLED Display Smartwatch
Description: The boAt Storm Pro Call is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation and is here to make life easy. Your Storm Pro Call will remove all obstructions that may come on your goal achieving path. The watch comes with Bluetooth calling and a Dialpad that saves up to 10 contacts, for you to stay connected 24x7. A large 1.78 Inches AMOLED display makes everything come to life. The 30 minutes ASAP charge feature and upto 7 days battery life of the watch keeps you moving, no matter what! The 700+ Active Modes of the Storm Pro Call will make every move count. The Crest App Health Ecosystem makes it easier to care for your loved ones health with Fitness Buddies, Wellness Crew and more! Weather Updates and IP68 Dust, Sweat & Splash Resistance will keep you on the go in all weathers.

Your Storm Pro will remove all obstructions that may come on your goal achieving path. A large 1.78 Inches AMOLED display makes everything come to life. The 30 minutes ASAP charge feature and upto 7 days battery life of the watch keeps you moving, no matter what! The 700+ Active Modes of the Storm Pro will make every move count with Heart Rate, Sp02 & Sleep Monitoring. The Crest App Health Ecosystem makes it easier to care for your loved ones health with Fitness Buddies, Wellness Crew and more! Weather Updates and IP68 Dust, Sweat & Splash Resistance will keep you on the go in all weathers.

Product_name: boAt Wave Connect with Bluetooth Calling, Voice Assistant and 1.69" HD Display Smartwatch
Description: The boAt Wave Connect is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation with a 4.29 cm (1.69’’) LCD display and 60+ sports modes. The heart rate & Sp02 monitoring features on the watch keep you up to date with your vitals at all times. The ambient sound detection feature will notify you about noise levels around you so you can find the silence within and without. With IP68 Dust, Sweat & Splash Resistance and an impressive 7 day battery life your smartwatch will be your smart fitness companion through thick and thin!

Look and feel your best with the lightweight yet durable Samsung Galaxy Fit.1 Easily track your fitness and wellness, day and night, in clear, vivid color. A simple glance at your wrist lets you monitor workouts, heart rate and sleep. And keep an eye on notifications from a comfortable, stylish fitness tracker that lasts up to a week on a single charge.2 1This device and related software are not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease. 2Battery life varies on usage. Meet the Fitbit Blaze - the smartwatch that comes with built-in GPS and a long-lasting battery, making it perfect for an outdoorsy lifestyle. It has an inbuilt activity tracker that tracks heart rate, steps taken, distance covered, calories burned and the number of hours you were active. The Auto Sleep Tracking feature keeps track of the duration for which you nap so you can identify sleeping trends and get enough rest. The wireless syncing feature automatically syncs your fitness stats with your smartphone and computer.

Product_name: Amazfit GTS2 Mini with 1.55" AMOLED Display Built-in Alexa Smartwatch
Description:
Monitoring your blood oxygen levels by intelligently monitoring your (SpO2) blood oxygen levels. Basic Usage Battery Life: 21 days
Super-Light weight body with only 19.5 grams, 8.95 MM Thin body, comfortable to wear day & night and during sports activities.
1.55 AMOLED Display with high 314 PPI Resolution for a crystal clear image and sharp details.
70+ built-in sports modes and 5 ATM water-resistance.
24H Heart Rate Tracking, Female cycle tracking, Sleep quality monitoring, Stress level monitoring and BIO tracker 2 PPG.
Bluetooth music control directly from your watch while exercise without having to pull out your phone.

Product_name: GARMIN Lily Sport, Smartwatch, upto 5 days battery, Women's Health & FitnessTracking Smartwatch
Description: Lily is the small and stylish smartwatch you’ve been waiting for. With a flick of your wrist or a tap of your finger, the stylish patterned lens lights up to reveal a bright touchscreen display that disappears when you’re done with it. Always be connected to what matters with call, text and email notifications right on your wrist. This smartwatch even tracks steps, sleep, heart rate, energy levels, women’s health data and more to help keep up with your lifestyle. And — with a battery that lasts up to 5 days between charges — it really can keep up. Lily must be connected to the Garmin Connect app on your compatible smartphone.

vívomove Sport is more than stylish. This hybrid smartwatch combines timeless analog looks with smart features, such as text messages from your paired smartphone delivered right to your wrist. Real watch hands move to reveal a hidden touchscreen display. Live better with a full suite of health and wellness tools, including Body Battery energy monitoring, advanced sleep monitoring and more (this device is intended to be an estimation of your activity and metrics; it is not a medical device). You can even track the distance and pace for outdoor walks and runs by connecting to the GPS on your smartphone. Get up to 5 days of battery life on a single charge — and up to one additional day in watch mode — so your watch can keep up with your busy life.

Product_name: GARMIN Lily Classic, Smartwatch, upto 5 days battery, Women's Health & FitnessTracking Smartwatch
Description: Lily is the small and stylish smartwatch you’ve been waiting for. With a flick of your wrist or a tap of your finger, the stylish patterned lens lights up to reveal a bright touchscreen display that disappears when you’re done with it. Always be connected to what matters with call, text and email notifications right on your wrist. This smartwatch even tracks steps, sleep, heart rate, energy levels, women’s health data and more to help keep up with your lifestyle. And — with a battery that lasts up to 5 days between charges — it really can keep up. Lily must be connected to the Garmin Connect app on your compatible smartphone.

Product_name: GARMIN Forerunner 745, GPS Multisport Watch, Training Stats, Advanced Running Dynamics Smartwatch
Description: Chase down new PRs with Forerunner 745. This GPS running watch is made for runners and triathletes like you who need detailed training stats and on-device workouts plus smartwatch functions like music, contactless payments and more. Preloaded activity profiles for cycling and pool swimming let you round out your training routine, and the multisport profile consolidates data for your brick workouts. Tap into advanced physio features like heat and altitude acclimation, training load focus and race predictor to meet your goals. Sync music from select streaming services (premium subscription required) to store on your watch for phone-free listening while you run.

Think Better, Not Bigger
The smaller-sized fēnix 6S series multisport watches let you add mapping, music, pace monitoring and more to your workouts — without adding bulk to your wrist.

Sync your favorite streaming services, and listen to music without your phone

Product_name: GARMIN Lily Classic, Smartwatch, upto 5 days battery, Women's Health & FitnessTracking Smartwatch
Description: Lily is the small and stylish smartwatch you’ve been waiting for. With a flick of your wrist or a tap of your finger, the stylish patterned lens lights up to reveal a bright touchscreen display that disappears when you’re done with it. Always be connected to what matters with call, text and email notifications right on your wrist. This smartwatch even tracks steps, sleep, heart rate, energy levels, women’s health data and more to help keep up with your lifestyle. And — with a battery that lasts up to 5 days between charges — it really can keep up. Lily must be connected to the Garmin Connect app on your compatible smartphone.

Product_name: GARMIN Lily Sport, Smartwatch, upto 5 days battery, Women's Health & FitnessTracking Smartwatch
Description: Lily is the small and stylish smartwatch you’ve been waiting for. With a flick of your wrist or a tap of your finger, the stylish patterned lens lights up to reveal a bright touchscreen display that disappears when you’re done with it. Always be connected to what matters with call, text and email notifications right on your wrist. This smartwatch even tracks steps, sleep, heart rate, energy levels, women’s health data and more to help keep up with your lifestyle. And — with a battery that lasts up to 5 days between charges — it really can keep up. Lily must be connected to the Garmin Connect app on your compatible smartphone.

Product_name: GARMIN Lily Sport, Smartwatch, upto 5 days battery, Women's Health & FitnessTracking Smartwatch
Description: Lily is the small and stylish smartwatch you’ve been waiting for. With a flick of your wrist or a tap of your finger, the stylish patterned lens lights up to reveal a bright touchscreen display that disappears when you’re done with it. Always be connected to what matters with call, text and email notifications right on your wrist. This smartwatch even tracks steps, sleep, heart rate, energy levels, women’s health data and more to help keep up with your lifestyle. And — with a battery that lasts up to 5 days between charges — it really can keep up. Lily must be connected to the Garmin Connect app on your compatible smartphone.

Inheriting the rigidity of the Instinct series, Instinct Solar GPS watches are also built to the U.S. military standard 810, tested for a range of environmental conditions, inlcuding operational altitude, falling impact, freezing, unfreezing and corrosion. With 10 ATM water resistance (rated to 100 meters), these watches enjoy all-round protection. Supported by both a Power Glass solar-charging lens and Power Manager, these watches bring you an incredible battery life in smartwatch and Expedition modes to let you exercise and explore without the worry of running out of power.

Product_name: GARMIN Venu, GPS Smartwatch with Music, Body Energy Monitoring, Animated Workouts Smartwatch
Description: Beautiful. Detailed. Alive. The venu GPS smartwatch features a bright, beautiful display and a battery life of up to five days, so you can spend more time doing the activities you love. Get on-screen, animated cardio, strength, yoga and pilates workouts right on your wrist. With the broadest available range of all-day health monitoring features including respiration tracking, body battery energy monitor, stress and more venu can show you the full picture of your health in vivid detail. Keep your phone and wallet at home, because this watch lets you download music for phone-free listening and Pay from the wrist using Garmin Pay contactless payment solution (available for supported cards from participating banks).

Product_name: GARMIN Garmin Instinct Solar Tactical Smartwatch
Description: BUILT FOR THE MISSION. DESIGNED FOR ENDURANCE. You forge your own path, so we forged the Instinct Solar GPS watch to keep up every step of the way — no matter how far you tread. Experience unprecedented battery life with solar charging. Military standard toughness lets you play rough without worry. GPS, GLONASS and Galileo. Your 3 best friends in the wild. Train smarter with built-in sports apps right on your wrist. Get notifications straight from your phone to your wrist. Do more. Charge less. Get up to 54 days in smartwatch mode.
Vivoactive 3 Element Cerise GPS Wearable Device with Touchscreen Display GPS, GLONASS, Garmin Elevate Wrist Heart Rate Monitor, Barometric Altimeter, Compass, Accelerometer, Thermometer

Product_name: GARMIN VIVOMOVE 3S Navy with Rose Gold Smartwatch
Description: The vívomove 3S smartwatch combines the traditional look of an analog watch with the essential smart features you count on to keep up with your busy life. Available in a variety of colors, there’s a vívomove 3S to suit every look. This smartwatch is packed with features that let you tune into your health, 24/7. Estimate Pulse Ox² at the wrist, keep tabs on your body’s energy levels with Body Battery energy monitoring, even track your menstrual cycle from month to month. vívomove 3 also tracks stress, sleep, heart rate³, hydration and more. If you like to change watch bands as often as you change your clothes, no problem. vívomove 3S is compatible with industry-standard 18 mm quick-release bands.

Product_name: GARMIN Fenix 6S Sapphire, Premium GPS Watch, Music, Pace Guidance and Pulse Ox Sensors Smartwatch
Description:
Think Better, Not Bigger
The smaller-sized fēnix 6S series multisport watches let you add mapping, music, pace monitoring and more to your workouts — without adding bulk to your wrist.

Wrist-based heart rate¹ and Pulse Ox² sensors add insight to your fitness activities
Dynamic PacePro feature helps you run smarter over various types of terrain
Preloaded ski maps for more than 2,000 resorts around the world
Measure running and cycling performance in ways you didn’t know were possible
Navigate your world with multi-GNSS satellite reference and outdoor sensors
Sync your favorite streaming services, and listen to music without your phone

HARNESS THE POWER OF THE SUN
Featuring a Power Glass solar charging lens and customizable power manager modes, this smartwatch can stay on and performance-ready for weeks.


Get a battery boost from the sunlight, so you can go longer between charges.


How is your body holding up? Wrist-based heart rate1 and Pulse Ox2 will let you know.


Need running pace guidance that knows the terrain? Check out the PacePro™ feature.


Navigate every adventure with TOPO maps right on your wrist.


Music on your wrist, and no phone weighing you down.


Leave the cord at home. Solar charging lets you get up to 14 days of battery life — and then some!

Product_name: GARMIN Forerunner 245 Music Japan Edition Smartwatch
Description: Forerunner 245 Music Japan Edition gives the born-to-run Forerunner 245 Music a bold red and white facelift. Its new look will inspire you to reach new heights and set new personal bests. Forerunner 245 Music Japan Edition features a matching red and white strap that not only catches the eye but also nods to the highest competitive ambitions of runners everywhere. Its metal buttons and buckle are complemented by a edition serial number plate, driving athletes’ desire to be among the medal winners. The exclusive Connect IQ watch face combines Mount Fuji with the sun disc of the Japanese flag, representing each runner’s determination to scale new peaks of performance.

Product_name: GARMIN Vivoactive 3 GPS Smartwatch with Built-in Sports Apps Smartwatch
Description: Personalise your watch with thousands of free watch faces, apps and widgets from our Connect IQ store More than 15 preloaded GPS and indoor sports apps, including yoga, running, swimming and more Monitor your fitness level with VO2 max and fitness age estimates, plus keep an eye on how you handle stress First Garmin wearable that is Garmin Pay ready, so customers can pay for purchases with their watch Get connected features such as smart notifications, automatic uploads to Garmin Connect, Live Track and more Battery life: up to 7 days in smartwatch mode; 13 hours in GPS mode

vívoactive 3 Element is compatible with our Connect IQ store, where you can download watch faces, widgets and apps that make it go from smartwatch to your watch. Turn on your lights at home with the SmartThings app, and even use the AccuWeather MinuteCast app to find out when the rain will start. You can also use our free Face It watch face app to add personality to your device that’s uniquely you. Just download the app, choose any image from your photo library, make your customizations, and set it as your watch’s face. More than 10 preloaded GPS and indoor sports apps, including yoga, running, and more. Finding a fun way to stay active is easy. When you head outside, built in GPS lets vívoactive 3 Element track the details of your chosen activity-with no phone connection required.

Product_name: GARMIN Instinct Solar – Camo Edition Smartwatch
Description: When you can rely on instinct, the world can rely on you. This rugged, reliable outdoor GPS Watch is built to the U. S. Military standard 810g for thermal, shock and water resistance (rated to 100 meters). The fiber-reinforced polymer case adds strength and durability, and The chemically-strengthened, scratch-resistant display is high-contrast enough to read in bright sunlight, So you can take it with you into the extremes you face every day. Plus, the fully vented silicone bands include two independent, removable keeper loops to ensure a secure fit and to keep you from getting caught on things. Water Rating: 10 atm.

Product_name: GARMIN Fenix 6 Pro Solar, Multisport GPS Watch, Advanced Training Features Smartwatch
Description: Fit for performance with rugged, sophisticated design that features an always-on 1.2” sunlight-readable display with bezels in stainless steel, titanium or diamond-like carbon (dlc) coating.

For athletes and outdoor adventurers, the fenix 5 plus series watches are the high-performance way to beat yesterday and bring your maps and music along. These rugged, premium-crafted watches feature routable colour mapping, wrist-based heart rate, storage for up to 1, 000 songs.

GPS Smartwatch with Music Storage and Playback Easily download up to 500 songs to your watch, and connect with Bluetooth® headphones (sold separately) for phone-free listening Customize with thousands of free watch faces, apps and more from our Connect IQ™ store More than 15 preloaded sports apps, including yoga, running, swimming, strength training and many more; use preloaded workouts, or create and download custom ones Monitor your fitness level with VO2 max and fitness age estimates, plus keep an eye on how you handle stress² Battery life³: up to 7 days in smartwatch mode and up to 5 hours in GPS with music mode

Smaller-sized Hybrid Smartwatch with Hidden Touchscreen Display
Stylish, traditional watch design with real watch hands
Touchscreen display is only visible when you needed it
Stay connected with smart notifications delivered right to your wrist
Tune in to your fitness and well-being with all-day health monitoring features
Connected GPS for tracking outdoor walk or run activities includes additional built-in activity profiles
Battery life: up to five days in smart mode and an additional week in watch mode (hands tell time only)

Be sport ready with House of Fossil smartwatch cuz we can guarantee that you won't be able to think of anything else. This Sport smartwatch features a blue silicone strap and lets you track your heart rate, customize your dial and more. So, choose from time-or function-based displays for easy access to your favorite features, and add your favorite third-party apps from the Google Play store. Smartwatches powered with Wear OS 4.4+ by Google are compatible with iPhone iOS 9.3+ and Android phones. A battery-efficient dial design provides up to 24 hours of use on a single charge, and the full color display allows you to customize your look.

Beauty meet brains, Fossil turned traditional into innovative with this battery-powered Q Jacqueline hybrid smartwatch. The silver stainless-steel case is paired with a pave silver five-link bracelet secured with two pusher foldover clasp. Powered by the Fossil Q App, this smartwatch is compatible with Android OS 5.0+ and iOS 9.0+ devices. Get notified of texts and calls, customize your buttons and change time zones with ease. The watch is absolutely sturdy and would definitely last you a lifetime.

A perfect amalgamation of modern and sport styles, from the Q Sport collection of Fossil. This Q SPORT touchscreen smartwatch features a blue silicone strap, and lets you track your heart rate, customize your face dial, sleep monitoring and more. Smartwatches powered with Wear OS by Google are compatible with iOS 9.3+ and Android OS 4.4+. This touchscreen smartwatch is built with Accelerometer, NFC, Ambient Light, Gyroscope which alerts you of notifications, and let you control music from your wrist.

Absolutely eye-catching, which looks like a watch, acts like a smartwatch, this Fossil Q Neely hybrid smartwatch features a navy stainless steel bracelet, never has to be charged and uses smart technology to send you notifications, track your activity and more. Powered by the Fossil Q App, Fossil Q Hybrid Smartwatches are compatible with Android OS 5.0+ and iOS 9.0+ devices. It is designed to raise your 'class' standard in any formal meeting.

Absolutely stunning in its looks, this black hybrid watch from the House of Fossil will give you elegance with the minimum efforts. Featuring a beautiful black mesh bracelet, secured with safety mesh buckle, the watch has a tracker display. The big round dial has gold topring which make this watch perfect to wear for a casual day out. Powered by Android Wear, this smartwatch connects with your favorite apps and is compatible with OS 5.0 and iOS 9.0 smartphones. It has fuctions like sensors, bluetooth enabled, and notification alert which add to the charm of the watch.

Beauty meet brains, Fossil turned traditional into innovative with this battery-powered Q Jacqueline hybrid smartwatch. The rose-gold stainless-steel case is paired with a pave rose-gold five-link bracelet secured with two pusher foldover clasp. Powered by the Fossil Q App, this smartwatch is compatible with Android OS 5.0+ and iOS 9.0+ devices. Get notified of texts and calls, customize your buttons and change time zones with ease. The watch is absolutely sturdy and would definitely last you a lifetime.

All you fitness and technology addicts, Fossil brings you this stunning smartwatch which strikes the perfect balance between great looks and impressive features. Simply connect your Android phone or iPhone with this Q smartwatch and keep track of your daily activity, from the number of steps you take to the calories you burn. That's not it, this smartwatch also notifies you on incoming calls and texts, and includes customizable watch faces.

All you fitness and technology addicts, Fossil brings you this stunning smartwatch which strikes the perfect balance between great looks and impressive features. Simply connect your Android phone or iPhone with this Q smartwatch and keep track of your daily activity, from the number of steps you take to the calories you burn. That's not it, this smartwatch also notifies you on incoming calls and texts, and includes customizable watch faces.

With smooth leather accents and a touchscreen that connects seamlessly to your phone, this smartwatch from Fossil is a perfect blend of modern and classy. By tracking your daily steps and calories, this watch also helps you stay fit. You can even read notifications and perform a variety of tasks by simply using your voice, thanks to the built-in microphone and speaker. Choose from the variety of customizable faces for something that suits your style best.
